definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: She noted down a number of objections in her note-book.
sentences.chinese: 她在本子上记下了好些反对理由。

sentences.english: That's why you should take notebooks and pens with you.
sentences.chinese: 还有，你们要带本子和笔来记东西。

sentences.english: I brought the old and the new versions of the book back the next day before noon.
sentences.chinese: 隔日中午前，我把本子的新旧版本带回去给他。

sentences.english: They replied that they used Dollar Store (i.e. cheap) notebooks for their work.
sentences.chinese: 可他们回答道，我们只用一元店的便宜本子来工作。

sentences.english: And God sold his doujinshi, that had good sale: and God would separate the otaku and the fujoshi.
sentences.chinese: 神的本子卖的不错，于是他打算把向性分开。

sentences.english: attach your decorative paper by gluing it across the top of the notebook.
sentences.chinese: 把用来装饰的纸从本子的顶部开始贴起，粘在本子上。

sentences.english: attach your decorative paper by gluing it across the top of the notebook.
sentences.chinese: 把用来装饰的纸从本子的顶部开始贴起，粘在本子上。

sentences.english: ME:I apply for 8 universities and 8 of them gave me the acceptances.
sentences.chinese: 我把整个本子递过去，里面有8所学校的录取信。

sentences.english: Crammed full of film companies desperate for good idea.
sentences.chinese: 那有的是电影公司在望眼欲穿等着好本子。

sentences.english: Once upon a complicated time, I always carried my notebook with me.
sentences.chinese: 曾经一段时间，我时刻随身携带我的小本子。

sentences.english: I bought a bunch of the imitations. The cost for 6 of these notebooks?
sentences.chinese: 我买了一大堆仿制品，6个这样的本子花了我多少钱？

sentences.english: Usually we write in journals, but I allow them to their writing in this book.
sentences.chinese: 通常做法是写日志，但是我让他们在这个本子上写作。

sentences.english: A huge tear plopped onto the page.
sentences.chinese: 一大滴眼泪“啪”地落在我的本子上。

sentences.english: If you are using a moleskine book, cut off the elastic flush with the cover.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的本子是带有皮筋的，要事先把皮筋剪掉。

sentences.english: A telephone directory is a book that lists all the telephone numbers.
sentences.chinese: 电话号薄是那种列有电话号码的本子。

sentences.english: The mdelecular formula, C6H14, does not show anything except the total number of carbon and hydrogen atoms.
sentences.chinese: 合女式C6H14只用往表现碳原子战氢本子的分数。

definition: to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
